items.content_html: A Lightweight JavaScript Utility Library
items.title: NenX/libjs: A Lightweight JavaScript Utility Library

items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
items.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
items.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: Dinosonic is a fast, lightweight music streaming server built with Deno, inspired by Subsonic.
items.title: sonicdino/dinosonic: Dinosonic is a fast, lightweight music streaming server built with Deno, inspired by Subsonic.

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript utility for managing tasks with priority tracking and completion status.
items.title: IsaacMoretti/Task-Manager-javascript: A lightweight JavaScript utility for managing tasks with priority tracking and completion status.

items.content_html: Buddy v1.0 is a lightweight local agent designed for task execution, orchestration, and simulation workflows. Originally built with more firepower, some advanced features have been redacted for ethical reasons — but what’s left is still smart, modular, and built to scale. The quieter you become, the more you are able to hear
items.title: Detin1990/Buddy_alpha1.0: Buddy v1.0 is a lightweight local agent designed for task execution, orchestration, and simulation workflows. Originally built with more firepower, some advanced features have been redacted for ethical reasons — but what’s left is still smart, modular, and built to scale. The quieter you become, the more you are able to hear
KumJungMin/my-lightweight-css

items.content_html: A lightweight React SDK for integrating Tapd's in-venue engagement features. Easily prompt users to join rewards, track visits, and trigger upsell actions using prebuilt, customizable components. Designed for seamless integration with any React-based frontend.
items.title: Just-Cr8if/tapd-react-sdk: A lightweight React SDK for integrating Tapd's in-venue engagement features. Easily prompt users to join rewards, track visits, and trigger upsell actions using prebuilt, customizable components. Designed for seamless integration with any React-based frontend.

items.content_html: a lightweight yet faster osm (either in xml or in json formats) to geojson convertor - 4x faster than xmldom + osmtogeojson in most situations - implemented in pure JavaScript without any 3rd party dependency
items.title: tibetty/osm2geojson-lite: a lightweight yet faster osm (either in xml or in json formats) to geojson convertor - 4x faster than xmldom + osmtogeojson in most situations - implemented in pure JavaScript without any 3rd party dependency

items.content_html: 🧈 ButterPop.js - A lightweight (<100KB), zero-dependency toast notification library with 23 beautiful themes. Create smooth, customizable notifications with flexible positioning, progress indicators, and interactive elements. Modern, accessible, and easy to integrate into any project.
items.title: BAHEKARPRANAV/ButterPop.js: 🧈 ButterPop.js - A lightweight (<100KB), zero-dependency toast notification library with 23 beautiful themes. Create smooth, customizable notifications with flexible positioning, progress indicators, and interactive elements. Modern, accessible, and easy to integrate into any project.
